title: vazhi kATTum tArakai
sahitya:
vazhi kATTum tArakai nI azhal kTTum nudal vizhiyAi


anupallavi

  shuzhi kATTum bhava jaladhi shuzhalginra nAyaDiyEn pazhi kATTum vinaiyuDaiyEn pAdaiyarindEghiDavE


caraNam    orunAL oLiyilaiyEl oIndadenran muyarcciyelAm neri mAriyODuginrEn nenju tadUmAruginrEn 
taDuttALum dayavuDaiyAi taNnamudak-kadir parappi aDuttEnuk-kArudalAi aghal vAnil ninriDuvAi
